history.proof: hecrush use: Nat.neq_0_succ, zero_max_div, n_SSn, Nat.neq_0 unfold: is_prime.

exceptions.exn: In environment contra_pi2 : forall d : nat, divides 0 d -> d = 1 \\/ d = 0 Unable to unify "~ (forall n : nat, n = 0)" with "0 = 1".

original: unfold not. intros contra_pi. unfold is_prime in contra_pi. destruct contra_pi as [contra_pi1 contra_pi2]. contradict contra_pi1. apply Nat.neq_0.
